name: JCJP Romaji Disabler (mog86uk)
description: Disable rōmaji from being shown in the lessons and tests on Japaneseclass.jp
additional_info:
https://japaneseclass.jp

!!!IMPORTANT!!!
To hide rōmaji in the tests you will need to have the font "Adobe Blank" installed. You can obtain it from here:
https://github.com/adobe-fonts/adobe-blank

- If you're not sure which file to download, "AdobeBlank.otf" will probably be fine.
- After the font downloads, double-click the font file and install it.
- Also, you need to completely close and reopen your web browser before newly installed fonts can be used in it.)
